original_text: If my land cry against me, or that the furrows likewise thereof complain;
korean_text: 만일 내 밭이 나를 향하여 부르짖고 밭이랑이 함께 울었다면

sentences.original_text: If my land cry against me
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 내 땅이 나를 향해 부르짖는다면

sentences.original_text: or that the furrows likewise thereof complain
